name: A Blue Ninja Rectangle
description:
Mix and Game Jam 2020

Theme : Mixed Genre

-------------------------------------

Description:

A blue ninja rectangle  running around bad red ninja triangles. 

The game is a mix between a platformer and turn-based game 

-------------------------------------

Controls:

Movements: WASD  or arrow keys

Jump:   Space

Pause: P

-------------------------------------

Credits:

Controller :  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/2d-flexible-platformer-c...

Lights: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/hard-light-2d-1522...

FX : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-free-109565

Sound : https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/funky-suspense
